author: IGN
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's Zombies mode reviewed by Will Borger on PC, also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

"I’m of two minds about Zombies this year. I think Ashes of the Damned is a good map when it works and that playing it with a good group is enjoyable. I think the core of the “do all the Easter Eggs” design is still quite strong. I also think this map is too damn big, that this year’s Easter Egg hunt takes too long to do in a single sitting, and that the experience when you’re matchmade with other players is miserable. The map being this difficult in a game that is more than happy to sell you impactful Gobblegums for real money also just… feels bad. I wouldn’t blame anyone for bowing out before they saw the end, though I am still personally determined to keep going. I can’t call this iteration of Zombies bad, but it feels like a remnant of something greater, a shambling corpse that reminds us of the man it used to be. See you next year."
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Zombies Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails, a naval expansion to the hit open-world medieval strategy RPG developed by TaleWorlds Entertainment. Players will interact with brand-new systems such as fully integrated naval travel, ship customisation, and large-scale sea battles, and more to take the battle to the seas. Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, GoG, and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #gaming
title: Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for House of Saturn, a retro horror game developed by Cathedra Games. Players will embody an exorcist trapped overnight in a haunted university building where demons stalk the environment, and the only escape is the uncovering of a sinister plot. Solve puzzles, scavenge for supplies, and survive House of Saturn, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: House of Saturn - Official Reveal Trailer

description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Code Violet, a third-person survival action shooter developed by TeamKill Media. Players will embody Violet Sinclair on a daring mission to escape an Aion Bioengineering Complex to take out dinosaurs and enemy forces. Get a look at the latest Gameplay Overview to see the game's inventory management, shooting mechanics, and more in Code Violet, launching on December 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

author: IGN
description: Check out this unsettling clip from Season 2 of the drama, reality horror series, The Creep Tapes. Season Two of The Creep Tapes continues to expose a collection of videotapes from the secret vault of the world's deadliest and most socially uncomfortable serial killer, played by Mark Duplass. The clip comes from Episode 203 titled "Mark," featuring guest star Robert Longstreet. The episode is inspired by the 2004 film Saw. Season 2 of The Creep Tapes is streaming now, and the new episode premieres November 28 on Shudder and AMC+

author: IGN
description:
Kirby has been so many different things since he first floated into our lives in 1992. Besides his dozens of transforming copy abilities, he’s been split into four differently-colored Kirbys, turned into yarn, warped into a ball we controlled on the DS touch screen, and so much more. And now that he’s hopped back on the Warp Star with the release of Kirby Air Riders on Nintendo Switch 2, we thought it was the perfect time to look back at the history of the pink puffball. 

From Kirby Planet Robobot to Epic Yarn and Kirby and the Forgotten Land, here are IGN’s top ten Kirby games of all time.

00:00 - Intro
00:33 - Kirby and the Amazing Mirror
01:15 - Kirby’s Dream Land 2
02:01 - Kirby: Triple Deluxe
02:45 - Kirby: Nightmare in Dreamland
03:36 - Kirby’s Epic Yarn
04:22 - Kirby Air Riders
05:17 - Kirby’s Return to Dreamland Deluxe
06:08 - Kirby Super Star Ultra
06:57 - Kirby and the Forgotten Land
07:54 - Kirby Planet Robobot

#IGN #Kirby #GameRankings
title: Top 10 Best Kirby Games, Ranked

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Hunt: Showdown 1896 trailer for the extraction shooter game to see what's coming with the new in-game event, Post Malone’s Murder Circus Encore. The Deposed King and former Ringmaster, portrayed by artist Post Malone, returns as the brutal Disciple of Death. ​The Post Malone’s Murder Circus Encore in-game event for Hunt: Showdown 1896 begins December 11, 2025 on Steam, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Game Pass, and Xbox Series X/S.

Having honed his skills in the shadows, he seeks to reclaim his Corrupted domain, but the fabled HelioStone – a key to his victory, remains lost. ​ 

The impossible has happened: the malevolent carnival has rematerialized, bleeding its surreal terror into the bayou and the gulch once more. Old foes and new alliances gather to face or benefit from the Corruption in its most festive shape to date. 

The Hunt: Showdown 1896 Post Malone’s Murder Circus Encore and Update 2.6 brings new features including Player Profile Customization, brand new Story C
title: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Official Post Malone's Murder Circus Encore Event Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Alt Cameos' Featurette for Zootopia 2, an upcoming Walt Disney Animation Studios film starring Ginnifer Goodwin and Jason Bateman. Take a look at the star-studded supporting cast of Zootopia 2, in theaters on November 26, 2025.

After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia’s history, rookie cops Judy Hopps (voice of Ginnifer Goodwin) and Nick Wilde (voice of Jason Bateman) find their partnership isn’t as solid as they thought when Chief Bogo (voice of Idris Elba) orders them to join the Partners in Crisis counseling program. But it doesn’t take long for their partnership to be put to the ultimate test when they find themselves on the twisting trail of a mystery tied to the arrival of a venomous snake in the animal metropolis. The trailer, poster and trailer stills are now available to download and share.

While Zootopia 2 introduces Gary De’Snake (voice of Ke Huy Quan), Nibbles (voice of Fortune Feimster) and quokka therapist Dr. Fuzzby (voice of Quinta Brunson), th
title: Zootopia 2 - Official 'Alt Cameos' Featurette (2025) Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Ke Huy Quan

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at a new batch of Nintendo Classics that have been added to the Nintendo Switch Online Service, offering classics of the past for the Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. On the NES side of things, players with a Nintendo Switch Online subscription can access the platforming beat 'em up game Battletoads, originally developed by Rare, alongside the fast-paced action platformer Ninja Gaiden 2: The Dark Sword of Chaos. 


For Game Boy fans, the Capcom-developed platform shooter Bionic Commando makes its way to the service next to the arrival of the acclaimed classic Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters, being added to the Nintendo Switch Online service as well. Battletoads, Ninja Gaiden 2: The Dark Sword of Chaos, Bionic Commando, and Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters are available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 through a subscription to Nintendo Switch Online.

#NintendoSwitch #Gaming #IGN
title: New Anticipated Nintendo Classics Are Now on Nintendo Switch Online

author: IGN
description:
The Inquisition needs loyal followers, and there are none more loyal than Ogryn Conscript 0-118-B, better known as Cogg. 

An unstoppable giant, boasting armor destroying strength and able to withstand high levels of damage, Cogg will be a valuable ally in Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy. 

Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy is a narrative-driven tactical RPG set in the Grimdark Universe. Set against the backdrop of the Noctis Aeterna, players will lead a warband of diverse companions in a battle against heresy and corruption! 

Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy will release on Windows PC (Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5, PS5 Pro), and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Warhammer40KDarkHeresy #RPG
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy - Official Cogg Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the Sublustrum trailer for this upcoming remake of the 2008 psychological adventure game. Sublustrum is remade by the original team at Phantomery Interactive, and it is reimagined in real-time full 3D with fresh puzzles and an expanded narrative. Sublustrum is the story of a writer unraveling the mysterious disappearance of his scientist brother and the purpose of the strange device he left behind. The hero finds himself lost in a space between reality and dreams, and the detective investigation turns into a surreal journey into his own subconscious. Sublustrum will be available on PC and consoles in fall 2026.
title: Sublustrum - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Cricket 26 reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on PlayStation 5. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and PC.

"During the moments it manages to keep everything together, Cricket 26 is genuinely capable of providing an entertaining and challenging form of bat-on-ball action that elevates it above the last couple of entries in the series like a lofted drive over the infield. However, the countless glitches and bugs still present even after a few post-release patches means it’s prone to break down as often as Ben Stokes’ body, and its small handful of new modes are either seriously undercooked or inaccessible at this stage, making it far from being a must-have upgrade for fans of Cricket 24 in its current form. Cricket 26 is a bit like fledgeling Aussie opener Sam Konstas – undoubtedly capable of genuine brilliance in bursts, but still clearly a work in progress not quite ready for the top of the order."
title: Cricket 26 Review

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A Far Cry TV series is in the works from It's Always Sunny's Rob Mac and Alien: Earth's Noah Hawley. The plot of the show is being kept secret, but it will be an anthology series with every season a new location and story, similar to Hawley's Fargo TV adaptation. Rob Mac will co-produce and star. In other news, a new Helldivers 2 warbond is coming, and it will feature a fan-favorite weapon from a fan-favorite movie about an invisible alien hunter stalking soldiers in a jungle. And finally, Stellar Blade was a hit on PC, as was Sony's other first-party titles they've brought to Steam, but is the hype dying down for Sony games on PC?
title: Far Cry TV Series Coming From It's Always Sunny's Rob Mac, Noah Hawley - IGN Daily Fix
